div.p: Year 14 of Imperator Caesar Traianus Hadrianus Augustus, Thoth 6. We, Apollonios and Theon, nomarchs, have received through Herakl[...], assistant of the 1%-and-2% duty of the gate of Karanis, through Psenamounis, Arab archer, one hundred and fourteen drachmas, which comes to 114 dr. Translation: W.G. Claytor, P.Mich. 21 836
